NHK has produced a very cool Joe Odagiri's Saito merchandise available from 
25th June.
http://shop.nhk-sc.or.jp/shop/goods/goods.asp?goods=040420044

This card is a kind of book coupon, usable to buying books at bookstores in 
Japan, though I wonder if anyone who get it dare use really...
They produced already telephone cards with Kondo, Hijikata and Okita.

I say hello to momoiro-usagi san!
It's very encouraging to see another Japanese member here.
I appreciate so much your comments on here and  on the message board, as I 
can usually post media related stuffs rather than historical things.

Tama
